snippet.title: MotoGP™14 Compact - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The game is now available on PlayStation®4, PlayStation®3, Playstation®Vita and on Steam. 

The compact version includes the following game mode:

Offline:
• Instant Race
• Grand Prix
• Championship
• Split Screen
• Time Attack


Online:
• Online Grand Prix
Features:

• MotoGP™ class (Moto2™ and Moto3™ won’t be playable in-game)
• Voiceover
• 18 official tracks
• All the team and official riders
• GP Points and Levels

MotoGP™14 features tracks and riders from the official MotoGP™ 2014 season, all the official manufacturers and 18 tracks.

Follow us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/motogpvideogame, check the Official Youtube channel http://www.youtube.com/motogpvideogame, use the hashtag #motogpvideogame or visit the official product site www.motogpvideogame.com.
